ygData.subject: Re: Kelin's Lullaby
ygData.msgSnippet: Are you using the lute? If not singing on  half assed works. Kolin ... From: Beth Moursund  To: eqbards@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
Are you using the lute? If not singing on half assed works.

Kolin
-----Original Message-----
From: Beth Moursund <scrybsprite@...>
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, April 30, 1999 5:21 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Re: Kelin's Lullaby


>From: Beth Moursund <scrybsprite@...>
>
>Both of the lists of song descriptions that I've seen raved over this
>spell. One called it "the feign death of the bard world." I just don't
>get it. I have never found it to do anything except make just about every
>monster in range mad at me, even when I tried it with a Mandolin and a
>string skill of 100.
>
>We tested it at the aquagoblin camp in Dagnor's Cauldron, playing the song
>to see if it would let me approach the camp without waking the goblins.
> Out of five tries (at 2 to 4 goblins apiece) I saw two messages of a
>goblin's head nodding, and all five times all of the goblins immediately
>swarmed me (including the one who nodded).
>
>Earlier, I tried it in Blackburrow on a batch of regular and scrawny
>gnolls, all green to me. (The remnants of a small train after the trainee
>fled the zone.) Again, they all attacked me. I also tried it in the
>newbie zone. Result: one rat nodding and one rat attacking me.
>
>Is there something I'm doing wrong, or are all the people who wrote good
>things about the song basing their comments on a beta version that no
>longer applies?
>
> - Windsong Wanderer, bard on Solusek Ro
>
>
